Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 311-1 Filed 07/02/21 Page 23 of 23

xj3q1gra SEALED

1 THE COURT: It would be fine, but my biggest problem, frankly, is I don't know when Judge Sweet's funeral is and I'm trying to figure out when I need to be here for Judge Sweet's funeral.
2 MR. ROSSMILLER: We're very grateful --
3 THE COURT: This goes to the top of the pile. I appreciate that this should have been dealt with sooner, and I'm sorry that it wasn't dealt with a week sooner or you would have had an answer.
4 MR. ROSSMILLER: We're grateful for the Court's attention and certainly appreciate the opportunity to explain how we ended up here.
5 THE COURT: Okay. Thank you.
6 MR. ROSSMILLER: Thank you, your Honor.
7 THE COURT: I appreciate it, Mr. Rossmiller.
8 oOo

SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 SDNY_GM_00000874
DOJ-OGR-00004916
